creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: uneven bands of darker and lighter indigo shades horizontally across jacket, except vertical on lower panels of sleeves; thick woven texture throughout, except collar and hems around bottom and sleeve openings; collar and hems deep blue; short sleeves have triangular batwing-like shape
title: Working jacket (sakiori shigotogi)
